citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 52A of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 –

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1993, No. 236 by –
                (i) omitting from Schedule 1 to that proclamation "2814" and substituting "9364"; and
                (ii) omitting Schedule 2 to that proclamation and substituting the following Schedule:

                    SCHEDULE 2 - Places of Access

                    Item  Description  Location      Distance in kilometres from pedestrian overpass adjacent to the Australian Maritime College, Newnham  1.  Newnham Link – east side  0.17  2.  Access road – west side  3.93  3.  Lilydale Main Road – east side  3.93
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                    
            (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    5 December 2011

    PETER G. UNDERWOOD

    Governor

    By His Excellency's Command,

    D. J. O'BYRNE

    Minister for Infrastructure

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 14 December 2011

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
